values:
fuckkkkkkk
things are getting progessivly more fucked up...but i seem to enjoy it likey ou wouldnt believe
this whole david vs the female populationg scenerio is getting more and more...interesting
i dont even wanna start...no do i have a clue where to
roll with them punches
rock and roll

i'm fairly sleep deprived, stressed and carrying a full wallet...
not sure if its worth the trade off

so in two weeks i get my own store
so come visit me at hillcrest

so i have no problem accepting giant mutant turtles, brains from dimension X, blimps and 10000's of foot clan and all that shit
but i find a clone of donatello unbelievable....

is there something wrong with my logic?

its been an interesting few weeks
lots of people/partying/ect
wasaga soon
bodip-BOW

ottawa in T- a few hours

party time
right now im a mix between milhouse and the dougler...in a good way

things have been good
very good
details aren't necessary, but im quite content with life these days

STOKED on cottages
stoked on two more days off

still gotta figure out ottawa
still gotta figure out that other scenerio

should start looking for a new job more seriously
should start saving more and spending less

gotta get a hair cut
gotta find a glassjaw cd...maybe under my stereo...

thats about it for now...i've been weird all day...i need a smoke

how did it get so complicated so fucking fast
FUCK

i didnt put myself up..
but damn did i kick that chair out

detox

so i wake up sick as a motherfucker witha  brutal ass chest cold and go to work

im fucking coughing and all that shit so i go to shoppers and get some cough syrup and proceded to drink far to much of it too fast....so im all spun and not quite sure whats going on from about 1 til 5 at work...i had to take a 20 minute nap in the back room. so then i go to the set your goals show and im still out of it and im hanging out with andrea from barrie (a whole other story)

so then during dagger mouth i wasnt even in the pit just chillin but i get clocked by some big guy and get all dazed again....so then i get phone calls from ppl telling 
then while i was waiting for ppl at sherbourne station i get a phone call from my brother saying mark just punched both him and evan in the head...so i flip and almost bust it over to antos to give someone i once called my best friend the beat down of a life time but margy stopped me becucase she reminded me that i was sick and mark is kinda psycho...

so we get to the pheonix and im there and have like 2 drinks and start feeling sketchy then get a big hug from behind from Andrea from work and her bf appears and gives me serious cut eye all night

then by drink 3 i started feeling really sketchy so i hopped a cab home

and then i didnt really get outta bed today

*deep breath


or at least thats what and how i think it went down

so last night sacha and ashley come running up to me, ask for my phone to take a picture of something and return with graffiti in the womens washroom that says " DBC rox my world!" and "i want hot sex with david coleman"

i'm halfway between creeped out and feeling fucking awesome

and then the lovely jenn sachs went and added "i did" under the second one. which i thought made it that much funnier

since when am i popular?

this weekend was bust
but im gonna start skating again

so the other night i think i got hustled...
dont worry about it
Ottawa was a sweet time for sure

ok
now's the time for me to do my best to stay outta trouble
cause god knows it could be heading this way, and fast

so it has been a really shitty week
quite a few things went down this week, all of which i coulda dealt with on their own, but it was just one after another after another after another...
it was to the point where i was out with some of my closest friends last night and i still couldnt have a very good time because i had so much on my mind

and the funny part is when i went to sacha's the other night to bitch, her mom totaly thougth we hooked up and asked sacha where i was in the morning becuase she thought i slept over4 and me and sacha banged all night. i infact was in bed by 12 that night

so hopefully this week will be the week of all these things becoming resolved. and if not, im going ot stay with kele in ottawa in 3 weeks, so hopefully i'll just drown myself at work until then
some days i really would like to have someone here with me

applications finished
its getting alot more real

so i really shouldn't go shopping when i dont have money
i've bought WAY to much clothing since xmas
i really dont need most of it, but sometimes you gotta look good

and dont try to resize alife shirts...it doesnt work
thank the big dude i didnt pay full price

bahhhh
i gotta stop watching heros for a few weeks and then watch like 4 episodes in a row, becuase they just get good and then theyre done

and sometimes something will just rub you completely the wrong way

so i did exactly what i planned to do tonight
saw most of the people who mean something to me. the oens i didnt see i know i'll see in the very near future
and got really really drunk for free

I'll never make love in this town again. Everyone on the dance floor is doomed. Hit the ground. Shut your mouth.
The prisoners have laid waste to the pulpit. You're in for it now. Are these helicopters for me?
Have I been appointed to speak? Then I'm going to Hell, and I'm taking the renaissance with me.


and that is how i feel on the eve of my birthday. for various reasons

man, some people, not some randoms but people you actually know and are friends with, can be so rude sometimes
no reason either
only slightly pissed me off
i should start djing...i think i could do a good job
yea so i didnt expect to end up at some unss unss club...but i have to say i kind fo enjoy texting...and drinking...

ok, this is the abridged version, as close to in order as can be pieced together at this time

got to alex's
drunken dancing and such
saw old faces
saw older faces
everyone got really drunk
counted down
think i mighta kissed somebody...nto too sure though
spray champagne everywhere
random phone calls/texts
mark tried to crowdsurf on the lineup for the bathroom
people started puking
landlord showed up and party got shut down
i walked to somewhere around bathurst and stclair before my drunkeness got the best of me and i grabbed a cab and went home(sorry bowsky)
went to sleep, and woke up at 530 in the morning to drunk to get outta bed and couldnt fall back asleep til like 10
had a million texts when i woke up


and now for my resolution:
i guess it would to figure out what I want to do with myself. yea, theres a little more to that than just what i wanna do schoolwise or anyhting like that. it's more figure out what i want outta friends, relationships, and everyhitng like that. i wanna start doing things for myself, what i want to do. not saying that anybody stopped me from doing anyhting before...or at least not directly, or even knowingly, but there were many(or was it few, im not really sure, nor does it matter) things i didnt do out fo fear of what those close ot me would say or think.
no more, this is for me
...and it all comes down to this...


and i gotta say...2007WHAT!...sorry, had to be there for that one

so new years is 1/3rd figured out
1/3 found a party

2/3 need to figure out what im drinking...thinking jager and champagne...but maybe something a little more class could be nice

3/3 needs me a date...

___________________________________________________________



that up there is the line
i crossed it, and not in a good way

things are pretty good.
could use some mroe hours at work
could use a second job
would like some loving, but with very specific stipulations
would love to not be 2000ish in debt

but all those minor details aside things are really good

and i've started writting again, kinda surprised where its going though

ok, so halloween weekend was fuckign awesome
friday - party, rad
saturday - news team assembeled and partied, rad
tuesday - predrinking and dance cave, rad...

UNTIL SOME FUCKING BITCH STOLE MY WALLET
so iw as dancing with soem broad and she was getting realyl grabby and then all of a sudden she was like " i have a boyfriend" and peaced really fucking fast. so went to the bar to get another drink, and then BAM no fucking wallet. no wonder that bitch was grabbing my ass.
so im drink and smokeless til i either get a new one in the mail or find someone to hook up a fake til then

AND i gotta buy a new wallet, which just really bothers me for some reason...the concept behind spending money on a device designed to hod the money you just spent really gets under my skin
six and solo...i think its official now

how many days constitutes a binge?

"when i woke up this morning was i drinking or dreaming..."

less than 11 months until im gone and have left this town with its places and people and sights and stories behind
i dont plan on going forever, but i dont know what will happen
i've spent the last little while thinking alot aobut the relationships i have with all of the people i know here...and have come to the conclusion that there are really only a small handful of those friendships which will stay with me. the few people i will miss i think i will miss them dearly. but in the last little while after telling alot of the people who are close to me about my plans i've been written off
i've been told im leaving for all the wrong reasons

so, despite the fact that none of these people read this i am not leaving because
1. i hate it here
2. i hate what i've become...although that took a little bit of tim to figure out
3. i hate the people here
4. there is nothing here for me anymore'
and most importantly,
5. i'm running from a certain person.

that last one needs some clairity. sometimes multiple things happen at the same time in someone's (my) life. but they have absolutely nothing to do with one another. i am not leaving because of what happened...if i was i would have left right away and not sorted out a relationship with one of the most important people i ever have and ever will know and care about.

but now that i am leaving and it is set in stone im fucking glad. i get to see who actually cares about me, i get to see who wishes me the best, and most importantly who is continuing to be my friend until i get on that train. i've already started to phase the illwishers and selfish fucks out of my life.
so, i guess if you hear from me in the next 11 months or so, know that you mean something to me.

and to set the record straight, i'm leaving for 2 reasons
1. to get get a fresh start because if i dont do this now i never will...and i'll never be able to grow and become the person i want to be
2. because i didnt have the balls to do this 2 years ago.

the people i love mean more to me than anything.

and i hope that now i have all my thoughts on the matter sorted out...because i can say i've really been a not so pleasent person to talk to and be around lately becuase of all of this on my chest.
-d

it's funny to see who'sgot your back when they know you're going to be gone in less than a year
it's about time for a friends-cut, and not in one fo them myspace ways

see: repeat

that sums it up...to me at least

a fucking picture, what was i thinking

jack and coke and fried tofu made my night

damn i'm good....i pull this shit once a month... 
well good isnt the word for it...but i pull it nonetheless. 
almost like fucking clockwork. 
i really gotta stop, but i have to get my thoughts in check first and figure out why my frustration causes me to take it out on the person who means more than anyhting to me. 
and i also have to figure out whats frustrating me and causing me so much ...(ugh) angst. 
it's this entire chain reaction... 
1. figure out whats been bothering me 
2. figure out why i take it out on those i care about 
3. stop hurting said person 


easier said than done...i guess

i was bored this afternoon and because i was feeling under the weather for various reasons i didnt feel up for leaving the house. so i cleaned my room, right down to ripping all the posters and shit off of my walls. i mean i'm 20 years, should i really have 6 year old magazine cut outs of rollerbladers and punkrock stars all over my space. the best part is that there are all these different shades of blue form where and how much the paint faded and got dirty.
now i need some paint, some picture and record frames...maybe some new furniture...or maybe for that lottery ticket to win so i can actually afford a real space of my own
-d
the waiting game sucks...lets play hungry hungry hippos

so they say bad things happen in threes
1. i basically ruined everyhitng and hurt the person who means more to me than anyone else, and i dont think it'll get any better any time soon.
2. i get woken up and called into work on my day off simply to get chewed out for not getting certain things done the day before despite the fact that the entire store was cleaned and about a million other thigns that needed to get done did, aside from one little task. AND get called in on my second day off...fucking sunrise

so now i sit waiting for the third
